Row.Text: Why do you continue to waste my time with this nonsense? Begone!
Did you not hear me the first time? Go away!
I'm sorry, are you hard of hearing? The answer will always be no!
I will not field such requests at this time. Please stop asking.
We've been over this before. I will not tell you of my affairs.
The answer remains no. We shall not provide diplomatic details at this time.
We would never share our diplomatic secrets with villians like you!
Do you honestly think I would tell a criminal like you my foreign policy?
Why would you waste your time asking about my foreign affairs? They are none of your business!
I'm sorry, but we prefer to keep our diplomatic secrets safe. Try again some other time.
My advisors deem it important to keep our foreign policy private. Maybe some other time?
We're not comfortable broadcasting our foreign affairs at this time. Perhaps another time?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} is a true friend and can be trusted. (Friendly)
I'm quite fond of {1_PlayerName:textkey} and look forward to our continued friendship. (Friendly)
{1_PlayerName:textkey} and I have been on good terms, and I see no reason why that would change. (Friendly)
I really don't have an opinion of {1_PlayerName:textkey}. (Neutral)
{1_PlayerName:textkey} is neither an enemy of mine nor my friend. (Neutral)
{1_PlayerName:textkey} doesn't bother me at all. (Neutral)
I'll be honest. I don't trust {1_PlayerName:textkey} one bit. (Guarded)
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has alarmed my advisors and we are monitoring the situation. (Guarded)
We're keeping an eye on {1_PlayerName:textkey} due to recent incidents. (Guarded)
{1_PlayerName:textkey}'s rule taints this earth and I would see no problem with it ending. (Hostile)
{1_PlayerName:textkey} is a tyrant and a villian that needs to be taken care of. (Hostile)
Don't remind me that {1_PlayerName:textkey} still walks this earth... (Hostile)
I look up to {1_PlayerName:textkey} with great envy! (Afraid)
I marvel at {1_PlayerName:textkey}'s success. (Afraid)
Hopefully one day I can be as good a leader as {1_PlayerName:textkey}. (Afraid)
{1_PlayerName:textkey} and I are at war! ([COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]AT WAR![ENDCOLOR])
{1_PlayerName:textkey} and I are locked in combat. ([COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]AT WAR![ENDCOLOR])
I am currently settling a dispute with {1_PlayerName:textkey}. ([COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]AT WAR![ENDCOLOR])
I trust you enough to confess that I am planning war against {1_PlayerName:textkey}. (Planning War!)
Don't be fooled by outward appearances. I plan to rid this earth of {1_PlayerName:textkey}. (Planning War!)
I'm sick of {1_PlayerName:textkey}'s presence and I plan on eliminating him soon. (Planning War!)
It may appear that I am friendly with {1_PlayerName:textkey} but that's all show. (Deceptive)
Think you can keep a secret? I plan on deceiving {1_PlayerName:textkey} at earliest convenience. (Deceptive)
I tell the world that {1_PlayerName:textkey} is a friend. I tell you in strictest confidence that that is not the case. (Deceptive)
We should mutually exchange our world maps and unlock the secrets of this world. What do you think?
We'd like to purchase your world map from you. Will you accept?
We'd like to purchase a technology from you. Is this acceptable?
Friend, please accept this offer as a gesture of gratitude for our friendship.
In your time of need I offer you a gift.
To show our support of our friendship, I offer your people this in hopes you will one day return the favor.
I am glad to help.
May this gift bring prosperity to your people.
It is my pleasure to assist those in need.
I'm sorry. My generosity does not extend as far as you'd like, I'm afraid.
You have asked for simply too much, I'm afraid. I cannot comply.
Absolutely not. I am a generous person, but that is too much you are asking me to give up.
I'm sorry, but I've already offered as much assistance as I can at this time. Maybe some other time.
It's been too soon since our last show of generosity. I'm afraid I must decline.
I cannot service this request at the moment. I'm sorry.
I'm sorry, but we haven't known you long enough to divulge our diplomatic secrets. Maybe in the future?
We haven't known each other long enough for me to reveal my foreign policy. The answer is no.
I only give away my foreign policy to those whom I trust. I cannot trust someone I've just met.
Your enslavement of my people brings embarassment to all of us. What do you want?
Oh, the tyrant shows his face again. How do you wish to exploit us further?
Oh? What brings the tyrant to my doorstep? Have you come to spit on us and our pride further?
Welcome, master, to my lands. How may I be of service?
Greetings! I hope you're pleased to know our workers are hard at work producing resources for your use.
Ah, welcome master! What assistance do you seek from us?
We're tired of your pathetic rule over us and are prepared to fight to the death to regain our independence.
Relinquish control over our empire, or suffer the consequences. Which sounds like the smarter plan?
My people want independence and there's nothing you can do to stop us. Now, we can do this the easy way, or the hard way. The choice is yours.
The time has come for my people to seek their own path in this world. We desire an independent nation. What say you?
Your occupation of our empire is no tolerable among my subjects and I am issuing a formal request that you allow my people to live as an individual sovereign state.
We believe the time has come to terminate our Vassalage agreement. Our people desire independent rule. Will you accept this?
My people are grateful you have decided to grant us our independence.
Freeing my people is very generous of you. You have my gratitude.
Restoring our independence is very gracious of you. May this day be remembered for centuries to come.
Very well. Our people shall fight to the death to ensure our independence.
You have chosen to pointlessly spill your men's blood over this. Our people shall not shy away from independence.
Very well, then. We shall fight to the death to ensure our freedom.
Very well. We grant you your independence and recognize your people as an independent state.
I accept. You are free from my empire's control.
Understood. We accept your right to independence.
Who do you think you're talking to? My puppets won't leave me that easily. Now I will bring down your insurrection.
You honestly thought that I would let you go that easily? Ha! No...now prepare to die.
You're nuts, right? Did you honestly think I would be that pathetic? I will enjoy smashing your armies into pieces.
I trusted you to defend us and you attacked us instead. What a shame.
How barbaric of you! You promised to protect our people and instead, you attack us! Make no mistake, I will kill you, and when I do, you will suffer.
You were our protector. It was said you would destroy our attackers, not join them! Bring prosperity to both of us, not leave us in darkness! You are lost, and now, the world shall know.
Oh look, my little pet state has come to see me. What do we you want?
Your men better be hard at work creating resources to please me. What do you want?
You stand in the presence of your superior. Kneel before me, or else.
What's this? A visit from my vassal? Is it tribute you offer?
Ah, one of my many servants? What do you have to offer?
I promise that my soldiers shall protect you and your land. What do you want?
As you wish, I shall move my troops from your border. My apologies for any trouble caused by this incident.
Very well, I will redirect my armies elsewhere.
Understood. I will move my troops at once.
Please understand, my troops are merely passing through! We mean no harm to your empire.
Don't be alarmed. We do not wish to harm you. Our troops are merely running drills.
I apologize for any concern my recent troop movements have caused you. Our troops are merely passing through the area and we have no intention of war.
As much as your soulless existence would be worth ending, my men do not wish to attack you at the moment. Consider yourself lucky.
Although it would be my pleasure to kill you, now is not the time for that.
No, my men aren't going to waste their time with you, yet. Your fear amuses me, however.
Maybe you're smarter than I thought. Perhaps you expected my eventual rise to world domination? Or maybe you're just stupid. Either way, time to die.
Honestly, there's no sense lying to you. You are merely a stepping stone to my ascent to greatness.
Ha! That's not the way I expect you to talk to your future ruler. Now, you must suffer.
I'll admit, at some point I thought you were a pretty good friend. However, it's time to show my true colors. My troops are aimed directly at your cities. Time to die.
What's this? Are you just trying to egg me on? Well, consider yourself lucky; you've succeeded. Prepare to die.
Your subject nations cry out for independence. Can you hear it? Come, what will it cost to get you to listen?
I beg of you, please release your vassals. Is this offer tempting enough?
Independence is a natural right. Come, let us restore balance by coming to an agreement for the sake of your vassals.
This gesture of kindness will not soon be forgotten. You have offered my people their freedom. I am forever in your debt.
It takes a wise and courageous leader to revoke their claims in the name of decency and freedom. My people will celebrate our Independence Day for centuries to come. You have my gratitude.
We thank you for recognizing our people as an independent state. May our people live on together, joined as allies.
We have decided to revoke our claim to your land. You may live on as a free people. You are no longer our vassal.
I believe our time as your master has come to an end. I grant you your independence. May we remain great allies in the future. You are no longer our vassal.
After careful consideration, we have decided to end our agreement and give you your freedom. May our empires flourish in the times to come. You are no longer our vassal.
I am disappointed you have chosen to raise our taxes. That money belongs to my people. Rest assured, our relations have been hurt.
I beg you, have mercy on our merchants. Your taxation disrupts our economy. I am disappointed you have chosen to pursue this path.
Your increase in our taxes is unacceptable. Is control over our political affairs not enough to satisfy your greed?
Ruling over another state incurs a large cost on us. We have decided to raise your taxes. I hope you will understand.
We are pleased to hear you have lowered our taxes. We can only hope this is a sign of goodthings to come.
I thank you for some relief on our taxes. We promise the increase to our economy will help both our nations out in the long run.
We find your decision to lower our taxes to be a move that will bring our people closer together. We thank you.
I am pleased to announce that I've lowered your taxes. Our empire can thrive just fine without your help, and I see no need to strain our relations unnecessarily.
